title: BYU's Davis Jr. arrested on suspicion of DUI
content: Kennard Davis Jr., who is a starter for a top-10 BYU squad this season, was arrested on suspicion of DUI following a crash in Provo, Utah, on Thursday, according to a release from local police.

title: 14 charged in Mafia-backed sports betting ring
content: Fourteen people were charged for their roles in a multimillion-dollar illegal sports betting ring that involved college athletes and had links to organized crime, New Jersey authorities announced Thursday.

title: Ex-'Last Chance U' coach shot on Oakland campus
content: John Beam, the former Laney Eagles head coach who was featured in the Netflix documentary series "Last Chance U," was taken to a hospital after he was shot on campus Thursday.

title: Dodgers' Ohtani becomes 4-time unanimous MVP
content: Dodgers star Shohei Ohtani won his fourth MVP in five seasons, all of them in unanimous fashion, beating out the Phillies' Kyle Schwarber and the Mets' Juan Soto for the 2025 NL award.

title: Maye keeps NFL-best Pats hot amid 'MVP' chants
content: Drake Maye heard chants of "MVP" after leading the Patriots to a 27-14 win over the Jets on Thursday night that boosted them to an NFL-best 9-2 record.

title: John Force, 76, retires after NHRA-best 157 wins
content: John Force, a 16-time Funny Car champion and the face of NHRA drag racing for nearly four decades, has formally retired.

title: Warriors' Curry, Under Armour ending partnership
content: Stephen Curry and Under Armour are ending their long-standing partnership, and sources told ESPN that Curry is expected to have freedom to wear other brands over the next year and pursue new partnership deals.

title: Will Tigers trade Skubal? What we learned about all 30 teams at the MLB GM meetings
content: From Tarik Skubal's status to the future of the Phillies' core, here are the top offseason priorities straight from every front office.

title: Our guide to every Week 11 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions, picks and nuggets
content: Football in Spain? Baker Mayfield vs. Josh Allen? Picks, predictions and stats for every Week 11 game.

title: Looking for the next Cignetti? Start with these traits and coaches
content: If one of the nine open Power 4 jobs wants to replicate Indiana's success, here are the steps they could take.

title: MLB Awards Week results: Aaron Judge, Shohei Ohtani win second consecutive MVPs
content: Baseball's best collected their hardware this week. We have everything to know about all the winners.

title: Welcome to the AJ Dybantsa Show: Inside BYU's big basketball bet
content: Advice from Kevin Durant. A program modeled after an NBA team. Here's how the No. 1 recruit landed in Provo.

title: Real or not real: Another perfect UConn season? UCLA's best team ever?
content: Can Azzi Fudd & Co. run the table? Is this Dawn Staley's best South Carolina backcourt? Let's debate.

title: NHL Power Rankings: 1-32 poll, one fantasy add for each team
content: Another week in, and the Avalanche remain at No. 1. Plus, get your fantasy team on track with a pickup for all 32.

title: Who would win the 2026 World Cup if it kicked off today?
content: We're seven months from the start of the 2026 World Cup. While qualification wraps up, our writers answer a simple question: Who's winning it right now?

title: VAR Review: Why was Ronaldo sent off for Portugal?
content: Cristiano Ronaldo was shown a red card against the Republic of Ireland after appearing to elbow Dara O'Shea.

title: Lions to consult Eminem for Thanksgiving halftime show advice
content: The hip-hop icon will be advising his hometown team on talent selection and halftime production of the show.

title: 'I get one week off the whole year': What can be done to fix the tennis season?
content: Pro tennis players often have very little time off before the next season begins -- and it can jeopardize their physical and mental health.﻿

title: Risers and fallers: Jalen Johnson on his way to superstar status
content: Steve Alexander highlights fantasy basketball names trending upwards or downwards, with key takeaways for each.

title: Why MLS is changing to summer-spring schedule with a winter break
content: MLS will soon adopt a schedule that will run from the summer through the spring, but how will the league manage matches in frigid winters?

title: Ranked: Europe's 10 worst transfers from this summer -- and the 5 best
content: After three months, we rank the 10 worst transfers and the 5 best from the summer of 2025 in the Premier League, LaLiga and the rest of Europe.

title: 1,800% gain, 70% strike rate: Chirag is man of the match in Bihar polls
content: In a remarkable turn of events, Chirag Paswan's Lok Janshakti Party (Ram Vilas) emerged as a game changer in the Bihar assembly elections, enhancing the NDA's overall performance. With votes pouring in for the LJP (RV), they clinched or led in 19 vital constituencies, dispelling earlier doubts about the alliance's seat sharing.

title: Bihar election results: Prashant Kishor's Jan Suraaj finds itself 'farsh par' - decoding the dud
content: Prashant Kishor's ambitious Jan Suraaj party faced a significant setback in the Bihar elections. Despite meticulous planning and a nationwide padyatra, the party struggled to connect with voters on the ground. A lack of local leadership and candidate recognition proved to be major hurdles. The party's focus on professional credentials over local roots also impacted its performance.

title: 'Gamcha' in the air: PM Modi leads celebrations after NDA's sweeping victory in Bihar
content: The BJP-led NDA celebrated a significant victory in the Bihar Assembly elections, crossing the 200-seat mark. Prime Minister Narendra Modi made a triumphant entry at the Delhi BJP headquarters, greeted by enthusiastic party workers. The Mahagathbandhan faced a disappointing performance in the polls.

title: Errol Musk warns of US ‘doom’; fears white minority shift; sparks debate
content: Errol Musk, father of Elon Musk, expressed concern that the U.S. will be 'doomed' if white people become a minority population within the next 20 years. He drew parallels to South Africa, claiming his community provided for Black people, a statement challenged by the interviewer regarding oppression.

title: 'Mahila-Youth': PM Modi says Bihar gave new M-Y formula, rejected appeasement politics
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi celebrated the NDA's historic win in Bihar, attributing the victory to the "Mahila and youth" and rejecting the opposition's "appeasement politics." Chief Minister Nitish Kumar thanked voters and PM Modi, emphasizing the NDA's unity and commitment to developing Bihar into a leading state.

title: ‘Few months were very different’: Indian student shares Ivy League experience
content: An Indian student at Cornell University, Harshvardhan Maskara, shares his journey navigating Ivy League academics and finances. He emphasizes early planning, understanding detailed course policies, and the significant cost of studying abroad, highlighting the importance of scholarships like the TATA Scholarship. Maskara's experience underscores the resilience and adaptability required for international students.

title: Nvidia's team flags ‘disconnect’: Emails reveal client concerns; what's the ‘complain’
content: Despite its recent valuation milestone, Nvidia faces internal challenges in its enterprise software sales. Employees express frustration over a lack of cohesive messaging and a "fundamental disconnect" with clients' legal and procurement teams in regulated industries. However, standalone software sales are exceeding targets, indicating optimism for future growth.

title: Bihar elections: How exit polls predicted outcome but missed the magnitude
content: Bihar's election results delivered a stunning landslide for the NDA, far exceeding exit poll predictions. While polls correctly anticipated an NDA victory, they drastically underestimated the scale of its triumph. This outcome echoes past elections, highlighting Bihar's unpredictable nature and raising questions about the accuracy of pre-election surveys.

title: Bihar results: From Magadh to Mithilanchal - NDA bowls out MGB across regions
content: The National Democratic Alliance is poised to retain power in Bihar with a significantly strengthened mandate, projected to win around 200 seats in the 243-member assembly. The BJP is leading in 91 seats and JD(U) in 79, outperforming rivals across all regions. The Mahagathbandhan secured only 37 seats, with RJD leading in 28.

title: Carnage! 15 sixes - Vaibhav unleashes mayhem on UAE in Rising Stars Asia Cup
content: Vaibhav Suryavanshi walked in with quiet intent but unleashed chaos within minutes. Every over seemed to bring a new flurry of sixes as he targeted every bowler with ruthless precision. His 42-ball 144, packed with 11 fours and 15 towering sixes, came at a scarcely believable strike rate of 342.86. The highlight of his innings was the 163-run partnership off just 57 balls with Naman Dhir (34 off 23), which shifted the momentum completely in India A’s favour.

title: GM to suppliers: Find alternatives to China; America’s largest carmaker sets deadline
content: General Motors is directing thousands of suppliers to remove China-sourced parts and raw materials from their supply chains, aiming for complete divestment by 2027. This move, intensified by deepening U.S.-China trade hostilities and President Trump's policies, seeks to enhance supply chain resiliency. Carmakers are accelerating efforts to unwind decades-old sourcing ties due to ongoing geopolitical and economic wrangling.

title: 'Jassi bhai said.. ': Siraj reveals Bumrah's costly advice
content: India's pacers dominated the opening day against South Africa, bundling them out for 159. Mohammed Siraj highlighted the challenging pitch, noting variable bounce and the effectiveness of bowling stump-to-stump, especially with reverse swing. Jasprit Bumrah's five-wicket haul was crucial. India ended at 37/1, trailing by 122 runs, in a strong position.

title: Bihar election results: How Nitish's 'flip' on freebies powered historic NDA win
content: Bihar's recent assembly elections saw the NDA achieve a significant win. The coalition's strategy focused on women-centric welfare programs and various giveaways. These initiatives, including cash allowances and grants, resonated strongly with voters, particularly women and first-time voters. This approach proved successful, mirroring similar electoral outcomes in Madhya Pradesh and Maharashtra.

title: Bihar results: 'Jab tak samose mein aalu rahega' - why you can never ignore Lalu
content: Lalu Prasad Yadav's influence persists in Bihar politics, even without his participation in the 2025 elections. His legacy, marked by both 'jungle raj' criticism and support for marginalized communities, continues to shape electoral strategies. Both ruling and opposition alliances invoke his name, highlighting his enduring relevance. Lalu remains a central figure in Bihar's political discourse.

title: Bumrah fifer puts IND in control; bad light forces early stumps as hosts trail by 122
content: Jasprit Bumrah's exceptional bowling performance, claiming 5 wickets for 27 runs, spearheaded India's dominance on day one of the first Test against South Africa. The visitors were bundled out for 159, and India reached 37/1 at stumps, trailing by 122 runs. KL Rahul and Washington Sundar remain at the crease, poised to build on Bumrah's decisive spell.

title: Another AI boost for Andhra! Ambani's Reliance announces 1 GW data centre
content: Reliance Industries is set to establish a 1 GW AI-focused data centre in Andhra Pradesh, complementing Google's earlier investment. This move aligns with the state's ambition to become a major data centre hub, aiming for 6 GW capacity. The agreement also includes a 6 GW solar power project and an integrated food park.

title: Women, welfare and the ‘phoenix’ CM: How Nitish-led NDA crushed MGB in Bihar - takeaways
content: Bihar's 2025 assembly election saw the NDA secure a decisive mandate, driven by women-centric welfare, caste recalibration, and strong organization. Nitish Kumar's leadership, PM Modi's appeal, and Chirag Paswan's performance were key factors. The results highlight the enduring impact of welfare schemes and women voters, while exposing the limitations of new political entrants and the INDIA bloc's disarray.

title: Bihar election results: Top winners and losers
content: Bihar's 2025 election sees the NDA secure a decisive victory, with Nitish Kumar and PM Modi emerging as key winners. Women voters played a pivotal role, driving turnout and influencing the mandate. Conversely, Tejashwi Yadav faced a significant setback, failing to convert momentum into votes, while Rahul Gandhi and Prashant Kishor also experienced disappointing results.

title: RCB sale: Why the road ahead is anything but smooth for Diageo India - Explained
content: Diageo India is reviewing its investment in the Royal Challengers Bengaluru franchise amidst a political storm following a tragic stampede in June that claimed 11 lives. The franchise's home ground, the M Chinnaswamy Stadium, is set to be overlooked for the 2026 T20 World Cup - just like it was for the Maharaja Trophy and the Women's ODI World Cup.

title: 63% of Indian Managers say AI training will be core team responsibility within five years
content: India’s leading companies are rapidly integrating artificial intelligence to transform the workplace. According to Microsoft’s 2025 Work Trend Index—India, 93% of leaders plan to use AI agents within 12–18 months to enhance productivity and workforce capacity. Frontier firms are redesigning operations around human-agent collaboration, prioritizing upskilling, agility, and innovation to shape India’s AI-powered future of work.

title: From litti chokha to jalebis: Streets burst into celebrations as NDA crosses 200 mark
content: The National Democratic Alliance (NDA) surged past 200 seats in the Bihar Assembly polls, triggering jubilant celebrations at BJP and JD(U) offices. Trends showed the NDA, led by Nitish Kumar and Narendra Modi, dominating the opposition. This election marked a significant test for Nitish Kumar, with high voter turnout and a historic lack of violence.

title: Ind vs SA: Yashasvi throws his wicket away; Gautam's reaction says it all
content: The stadium fell silent as Yashasvi Jaiswal stood momentarily in disbelief before trudging off for 12 off 27 balls, an innings that included three boundaries. It was the wicket Jansen had been relentlessly searching for, and it gave South Africa an early lift.

title: SIR, vote chori: Oppn looks for excuses as NDA eyes supermajority in Bihar
content: Early Bihar election trends show the NDA leading significantly, prompting the Mahagathbandhan to renew "vote chori" accusations. Congress leaders allege the Election Commission colluded with the ruling party, citing alleged irregularities and money distribution. They frame the outcome as a contest between the ECI and the people of Bihar, awaiting final results.

title: Ind vs SA: Boom boom! Jasprit Bumrah sets new record!
content: Jasprit Bumrah was unplayable on Friday, ripping through South Africa's batting lineup with a stunning 5 for 27. His fiery spell dismantled the visitors after a strong start, leading to their collapse for a mere 159.

title: Bihar election: Maithili in lead; Khesari, Ritesh struggle - how celebrity candidates fared
content: In the Bihar Assembly polls, singer Maithili Thakur is poised for victory on a BJP ticket, while actor-singer Khesari Lal Yadav and singer Ritesh Pandey are trailing. The ruling NDA is heading towards a landslide victory, leading in over 200 seats.

title: Jubilee Hills bypoll: Naveen Yadav wrests for Congress with 24,000-vote win
content: Congress candidate V. Naveen Yadav secured a decisive victory in the Jubilee Hills Assembly by-poll. He defeated BRS contender Maganti Sunitha Gopinath by a margin of approximately 24,658 votes. This win strengthens Chief Minister A. Revanth Reddy's leadership and consolidates Congress's position in Hyderabad. The BRS faces challenges after this outcome. Muslim voters played a crucial role in the election.

title: Bihar election results: Maithili Thakur headed for big debut
content: Folk singer Maithili Thakur has achieved a historic victory for the BJP in Bihar's Alinagar constituency, marking the party's first win from the seat. The 25-year-old singer, known for her traditional folk performances and strong social media presence, defeated RJD's Binod Mishra, potentially becoming the state's youngest MLA.

title: Veteran actress Kamini Kaushal passes away at 98; family requests privacy
content: Veteran actress Kamini Kaushal, a beloved icon of Hindi cinema, has passed away at 98. Her illustrious career spanned over seven decades, beginning with the Cannes award-winning 'Neecha Nagar' in 1946. Known for her grace and talent, she delivered memorable performances in numerous films, leaving an indelible mark on Indian cinema.

title: Where is Jan Suraaj? Prashant Kishor’s party’s ambitious debut fails to show up in trends
content: Early Bihar election trends show the NDA leading significantly, with the Mahagathbandhan trailing. Prashant Kishor's Jan Suraaj party, despite contesting over 200 seats, has shown no substantial traction in the initial results. Exit polls had also predicted a dismal performance for Jan Suraaj.

title: Tarn Taran bypoll result: AAP retains assembly seat with Harmeet Sandhu
content: Tarn Taran Assembly by-election in Punjab recorded a voter turnout of 60.95%, a slight decrease from the 2022 assembly elections. Polling was peaceful across 222 booths, with the results to be declared today. The by-election, necessitated by the death of an AAP MLA, is a key test for the ruling party's popularity.

title: Bumrah, Pant's 'bauna' remark on Temba Bavuma caught on stump mic - Watch
content: Jasprit Bumrah's impressive bowling spell in the first Test against South Africa was overshadowed by a controversial on-field exchange. A remark allegedly made by either Bumrah or Rishabh Pant about Temba Bavuma's height during a DRS discussion went viral, sparking debate online.  South Africa won the toss and opted to bat.

title: First gold in 18 years: India stuns Korea; scripts history in recurve archery
content: India's men's recurve archery team clinched a historic gold at the Asian Championships, defeating South Korea in a thrilling shoot-off after an 18-year drought. This remarkable victory, part of India's four gold and two silver haul, saw the team fight back from a deficit. Coach Rahul Banerjee hailed the win, with the next target set on the Asian Games.

title: Delhi blast: 2 Al-Falah-trained Kashmiri doctors held; police search Kanpur, Hapur campuses
content: Authorities have detained two Kashmiri doctors in Uttar Pradesh as part of the investigation into a Jaish-e-Mohammed module linked to a Delhi car blast. Dr. Mohammed Arif Mir, a cardiology postgraduate in Kanpur, and Dr. Farooq Ahmad Dar, an assistant professor in Hapur, were apprehended. Both had previously studied at Al-Falah University.

title: Heartwarming! Viv Richards blesses Unmukt Chand's son - Watch
content: Former Delhi cricketer Unmukt Chand met West Indies legend Sir Vivian Richards in Florida. Richards blessed Chand's son, Krishay, a moment Chand called unforgettable. Richards also advised Chand to play cricket with the same heart regardless of the country or franchise.

title: Leopard attack stuns Bengaluru safari visitors: Big cat strikes through bus window — watch
content: A leopard attacked a safari bus at Bannerughatta Biological Park, injuring a tourist. Authorities have indefinitely suspended non-AC bus safaris for a safety review. This marks the second leopard-related incident in three months, prompting renewed concerns about visitor safety within the enclosure.

title: Bihar polls: Tej Pratap Yadav stares at defeat in Mahua; LJP(RV) takes lead in key seat
content: Tej Pratap Yadav is trailing in fourth place in the Mahua constituency as Bihar Assembly election counting begins. LJP (Ram Vilas) candidate Sanjay Kumar Singh is currently leading. This comes amid controversy over an RJD leader's warning to election officials, for which an FIR has been filed.

title: Pakistan taking no chance! SL team gets President-level security - Watch
content: Pakistan has deployed its army and paramilitary forces to ensure the safety of the Sri Lankan cricket team following a deadly suicide bombing in Islamabad. Despite initial player concerns, comprehensive security assurances from Pakistani authorities have led the team to continue their tour. This comes amid heightened security and memories of a past attack on the Sri Lankan team.

title: Danapur: BJP’s Ram Kripal Yadav pulls ahead, extends lead over RJD’s Rit Lal Roy
content: In the Danapur constituency, BJP's Ram Kripal Yadav is steadily extending his lead after 29 rounds of counting, positioning himself advantageously against the RJD's Rit Lal Roy. This seat, located in Patna district, has experienced a dynamic political atmosphere, with historical patterns of fluctuating party support.

title: Bihar polls: NDA heading for landslide victory; trends show 'susashan' winning
content: The NDA is surging ahead in Bihar's assembly elections, with early trends indicating a strong mandate powered by Nitish Kumar and Narendra Modi. This election, seen as a test for Kumar, appears to counter recent questions about shifting alliances and voter fatigue. Counting for all 243 seats is underway, with results expected by evening.

title: Bihar Results LIVE: "Congress May See A Split Soon": PM Modi's Big Prediction After Bihar Landslide
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi -- on a day the NDA achieved a sweeping victory in Bihar -- predicted about another split in the Congress and warned its allies that they need to be wary of the Grand Old Party.

title: Israel Returns Bodies Of 15 Palestinians: Gaza Health Officials
content: Israel returned the bodies of 15 Palestinians to Gaza on Friday, officials at Nasser hospital in Khan Younis said, in the latest step to fulfil the terms of the fragile US-brokered ceasefire agreement.

title: Independent Jyoti Singh, Wife Of BJP Leader Pawan Singh, Loses In Karakat
content: Independent candidate Jyoti Singh, wife of Bhojpuri actor Pawan Singh, lost by 50,688 votes against Arun Singh of CPI (M-L) Liberation in Karakat Assembly constituency in Bihar.

title: "Ganga Flows From Bihar To Bengal, Created Path Of Victory For BJP": PM Modi
content: The NDA's massive win in Bihar has set the groundwork for a similar performance in neighbouring West Bengal, where Mamata Banerjee's Trinamool Congress holds power, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said at the BJP's headquarters in Delhi today.

title: Assembly Bypolls Result Live Updates: Congress, BJP, PDP Register Key Victories In Assembly Bypolls
content: The counting of votes for the recent Assembly by-elections reveals a mixed outcome, with both the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) and the Congress marking notable victories and leads.

title: Bihar Election Results Live - "Why Couldn't They Defeat BJP" - A Owaisi's Question To Opposition
content: Election Results 2025 LIVE Updates: The NDA in Bihar appeared to be headed towards a thumping victory and Chief Minister Nitish Kumar seemed prepared to secure a fifth consecutive term. Tejashwi Yadav won by over 11,000 votes.

title: "Congress Is MMC - Muslim League Maoist Congress": PM Modi After Bihar Win
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today said that the people of Bihar broke all records following the National Democratic Alliance's (NDA) landslide victory in the state's Assembly elections.

title: BJP's "Bengal Next" Post After Bihar Victory, Then Trinamool's Meme Reply
content: With the results almost decided in Bihar, all eyes are now on West Bengal, where elections are due in the next six months.

title: Indian-Origin Doctor Says "Completely Forgot" Deaths Linked To His Surgeries
content: Nearly two decades after the Bundaberg scandal, Indian-origin surgeon Jayant Patel has brushed aside the events that once made him one of Australia's most infamous medical figures.

title: Bihar Results LIVE: Why Rs 10,000 Is Not Sole Factor Behind Women's Bumper Support For NDA
content: As the NDA preps for a victory party and the Opposition's Mahagathbandhan stares at a rout in the Bihar Assembly election, a big question is which factors turned what was likely to be a close contest into an NDA sweep

title: Opinion: Opinion | Dear Delhi Pollsters, Please Stop Writing Nitish Kumar Off Every Election
content: The JD(U)'s tally of more than 80 seats reaffirms what analysts often forget: Nitish's electoral machine, and the social coalitions it rests on, do not wither simply because poll pundits in Delhi want a new plotline.

title: Political Heavyweights Who Won Bihar Polls. See Pictures
content: In the 2025 Bihar Assembly elections, several political heavyweights and prominent figures emerged victorious as the BJP-led National Democratic Alliance registered a landslide win.

title: PM Modi's Praise For Election Commission, SIR Amid Opposition Fire
content: At a time when the Election Commission has come under fire from the opposition over allegations of vote theft and the timing of the Special Intensive Revision, PM Narendra Modi has praised the poll body for the way it conducted the Bihar elections.

title: 8 Injured While Trying To Rescue Leopard In Residential Area In Maharashtra
content: Eight persons, including two forest department personnel, were injured on Friday afternoon while trying to rescue a leopard that entered a densely populated area in Nashik, an official said.

title: Double Defeat For National Conference In J&K Bypolls, Congress Wins In Rajasthan
content: Ruling parties lost four of the eight seats where assembly bypolls were held on November 11 with the Congress bagging one seat in BJP-ruled Rajasthan.

title: Bihar Results LIVE: NDA Overdelivers In Bihar, Tejashwi & Co Crash Land. PM's Next Target - Bengal
content: The ruling NDA is set for another term in power in Bihar with a landslide win, powered by its caste math and the personal popularity of Chief Minister Nitish Kumar. The Opposition Grand Alliance is in a tailspin with one of its lowest scores.

title: Hold Simultaneous Rajasthan Panchayat, Civic Polls By April 15: Court
content: The High Court has issued a significant directive to the Rajasthan government, ordering that Panchayat and Municipal elections be conducted simultaneously by April 15, 2026.

title: PK Guided Many Leaders To Poll Wins. His Party Fails To Open Bihar Account
content: Prashant Kishor guided many a leader to electoral victory, but faced a massive defeat in his first poll test. His Jan Suraaj Party has scored a zero in this election

title: "Democracy Won": PM Modi Thanks People For Odisha, J&K Bypolls Win
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi thanked the people for voting the BJP to power in Jammu and Kashmir's Nagrota and Odisha's Nuapada.

title: Bihar Results LIVE: Will Chirag Paswan Be Nitish Kumar's Deputy In Bihar? Here's What He Said
content: Chirag Paswan, the son of late Bihar leader Ram Vilas Paswan, has come of age in the just concluded assembly election, leaving a huge footprint on the state and the alliance. His Lok Jan Shakti Party (Ram Vilas) is leading on 19 seats, up from 1.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United turn to Dortmund's Adeyemi
content: aubameyang: I wasn't happy at Manchester City anymore - but I was not happy at the club anymore . arsenal are pushing to get the 23-year-old to pen a new contract . Antoine Semenyo has two goals in 10 Bundesliga appearances .

title: How to watch ESPN amid Disney-YouTube TV blackout
content: the blackout affects ABC, the ESPN networks, the Disney-branded channels, Freeform, the FX networks and the Xfinity network . the conflict affects the channel's ability to carry Disney programming . if you don't have cable access, you can get instant access to ESPN content through a variety of services including Cox, Dish, DirecTV, Fios, Fubo, Hulu + Live TV, Mediacom, Optimum, Sling, Spectrum TV and

title: Don't be surprised if ... Randle leads Timberwolves in fantasy points
content: if any of these thoughts come true, don't be surprised . he is off to a fantastic start, averaging 25.4 PPG, 7.2 RPG and 6.2 APG through 11 games . his numbers fell in most categories and he finished outside the top 50 in fantasy scoring .

title: The Playbook: Lineup locks, Shadow Reports for Week 11
content: this column features score projections, over/unders, win probabilities, and, of course, easy digestible fantasy advice for seasonlong leagues and DFS . the weekly Shadow Reports: WR vs. CB Cheat Shutter explains why he is hesitant to start Jameson Williams in fantasy .

title: CFP rankings release: See the second top 25 and bracket
content: the college football playoff committee will release its rankings each Tuesday through the end of the regular season . the final set of rankings will be released on Dec. 7 and those rankings will determine the final 12-team bracket . based on the CFP top 25 .

title: Patriots', Rams' Rivalries uniforms top NFL Week 11 threads
content: the storm blue jerseys are matched with white pants and matte white helmets . the jerseys represent the six states that make up New England and the franchise's six Super Bowl wins . it's the first time the los Angeles Rams will wear "midnight navy"

title: Last-minute pickups for Week 11: Joe Flacco, Devin Singletary among top options
content: this column will focus mostly on players rostered in fewer than 50% of ESPN leagues, with occasional exceptions . a volume thrower has put up big numbers over the past month, plus two signal-callers who provide rushing upside . there are a couple of pass-catching running backs in here as well .

title: One self-taught team's plan to take down the greatest MMA lineage with 'no credentials'﻿
content: the head coach of Scrappy MMA in Perth, Australia, is one of the least-qualified trainers to be involved in a UFC title fight . the former lightweight champion is the only pound-for-pound fighter in the world . he is the first MMA fighter to retire undefeated, according to the online database .

title: Friendly fights, Lalu's shadow: 5 reasons behind MGB's stunning loss
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. The TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape, ensuring that our readers are equipped with the latest developments that matter most." title: NFL: Chiefs road favorites at Broncos, Seahawks slight 'dogs at Rams
content: the red-hot new England Patriots beat their division rival New York Jets on "Thursday Night Football" the Miami Dolphins are favored by 2.5 against the Washington Commanders in Madrid, Spain . the rest of the day features a plethora of marquee matchups, including the underdog Tampa Bay Buccaneers .

title: TreVeyon Henderson helps power Patriots to best record in NFL after win over Jets
content: rookie running back TreVeyon Henderson fills in for injured starter Rhamondre Stevenson . the new England Patriots beat the new york Jets 27-14 on friday night . he is the third rookie in Patriots history with three touchouts .

title: 'It's tough to get overlooked': Pitt and Mason Heintschel are ready to play spoiler
content: pat Narduzzi points out Mason Heintschel . he is an 18-year-old true freshman with five career college starts . the Panthers are 7-2 and have a chance to put a hammer to the College Football Playoff chances .

title: Yankees' Judge edges Raleigh, wins third AL MVP
content: the American League Most Valuable Player Award was voted by the Baseball Writers' Association of America . judge was the 13th player to win three or more MVPs . he joins Yogi Berra, Joe DiMaggio and Mickey Mantle as the only Yankees to achieve the feat .

title: Old SEC vs. new SEC, Notre Dame's last test and more ACC chaos ahead in Week 12
content: most teams will lose another game . there's about a 1-in-3 chance that we end up with even a three-way tie of 7-1 teams atop the ACC . only one has greater than a 54% chance of winning out .

title: Bihar election results 2025: 5 reasons behind NDA's historic win
content: the 2025 polls unfolded against the backdrop of a meticulously crafted campaign focused on stability, development, and inclusivity . the NDA's narrative of 'double-engine government' under prime minister Narendra Modi and chief minister Nitish Kumar resonated powerfully with the voters .

title: Area 51, an alien and the most fearsome young duo in the NBA
content: stepon CASTLE screamed, streaking down the floor with 8:28 left in the second quarter of the San Antonio Spurs . "RIM, VIC!" was a turning point in tv's season-opening win in Dallas . a whistle quickly pierced the noisy celebration as Dallas called a timeout to regroup .

title: 🏀 NBA intel: Mavs' spiral, early-season trends
content: there weren't many people believing GM Nico Harrison should have remained as Mavs general manager . we decided to ask league executives and scouts if they're believing in some of the most impactful early-season trends across the NBA . the crater that is the Mavericks franchise before moving on to hot starts for the lakers .

title: 'He fights for all of us': Lions players tell their favorite Dan Campbell stories
content: first-year offensive coordinator John Morton took over playcalling for the Lions . the game marked the third straight contest in which Detroit had failed to score 30 . he was given the tall task of following previous coordinator Ben Johnson in the role .

title: Five players who are working out with their new teams -- and five who aren't
content: field Yates breaks down his top 10 ranking for Rico Dowdle against the Falcons in week 11 . he's ranked in the top 10 for the team through trades or free agency . five players have excelled in their new surroundings through 10 weeks .

title: Indian military heritage festival 2025 begins; Minister stresses need to preserve military legacy
content: Minister of State for Defence Sanjay Seth says understanding India’s military history is not just a matter of pride but a way to build a stronger foundation for self-reliance and national security

title: MoUs worth ₹3.49 lakh crore reached on Day-1 of CII Partnership Summit in Visakhapatnam
content: Among them are an agreement by the Reliance Industries Limited to set up a 1-Gigawatt AI Data Centre and a 6 GWp solar power project to power it, and build a greenfield integrated food park in Rayalaseema region

title: Rabi water release schedule for Tungabhadra canals announced
content: Deputy Chief Minister D.K. Shivakumar, who holds the Water Resources portfolio, chairs meeting to review water availability in the reservoir

title: NHAI team inspects site of girder collapse
content: A pickup driver was killed when the girder fell on his vehicle on the Aroor-Thuravoor elevated highway in Alappuzha

title: Three-day bird festival begins in Wayanad
content: Hundreds flocked to the first-ever experiential bird festival, ‘Haekki Benakku’, which began at the Hume Centre for Ecology and Wildlife Biology at Puliyarmala near Kalpetta

title: Karnataka High Court directs State government to give status report on implementation of Rights of Persons with Disabilities Act
content: The High Court of Karnataka on Friday directed the State government to file a status report on the implementation of various important provisions of the Rights of Persons with Disabilities Act, 2016, on a PIL petition, which has complained about Karnataka’s ‘persistent and unjustifiable delay’ in implementing the mandate of this law meant for welfare of persons with disabilities.

title: Delhi HC seeks Centre’s reply on Ashok Swain blacklisting plea
content: Academic challenges alleged blacklisting order barring his India entry; court asks Centre to file response in three weeks

title: Bihar 2025 results: Congress leads in one seat along Voter Adhikar Yatra route, RJD and Left in none
content: In the 31 seats along the Yatra route , the RJD had fielded 14 candidates, the Congress 16 candidates

title: CM, Dy. CM accept people’s verdict in Bihar; BJP-JD(S) says verdict will be repeated in Karnataka in 2028
content: Union Minister and JD(S) leader H D Kumaraswamy says that Bihar voters taught a lesson to Congress for its false propaganda on ‘vote chori’

title: Zonal competitions of SGOU arts festival from Nov. 15
content: The State festival will be held from November 28 to 30. Over 1,000 students from 11 study centres in Thiruvananthapuram, Pathanamthitta, and Kollam districts will participate in the competitions

title: Ham radios inside Moolamattom power plant aid in KSEB’s repair works
content: Six ham radio repeaters have been fixed inside the 1.5-km-long tunnel of the power plant to share updates to officials during repair works

title: NDA win in Bihar destroyed ‘communal MY formula’ of ‘jungle raj people’: PM Modi
content: Taking a swipe at the Congress, the Prime Minister said the party will witness a big split soon as “some naamdars within party are drowning everyone with them”.

title: Enumeration forms distributed to over 91% voters in SIR Phase 2: ECI
content: So far, 46.5 crore enumeration forms have been distributed in 12 States and UTs, which have a total of almost 51 crore registered electors; Kerala lags behind with just 75% coverage so far

title: Bihar poll result skews leadership change narrative in Karnataka
content: Given the party’s poor performance in Bihar, would the party take the risk of removing the Chief Minister at this point in time remains the key question

title: Paddy dryer developed for Kerala’s indigenous varieties
content: Amrita Technology Enabling Centre’s innovation maintains a controlled, low-temperature environment to ensure uniform moisture reduction without compromising the nutritional, aromatic, or medicinal qualities of paddy

title: Four months after fare revision, most Bengaluru autos still operate without recalibrated meters
content: The revised fares, which came into effect on August 1, increased the minimum fare from ₹30 to ₹36 for the first 2 km, while the per-km charge rose from ₹15 to ₹18

title: Will India’s first airport multiplex survive? Madras High Court reserves orders in Aerohub PVR INOX case
content: Justice M. Dhandapani defers his verdict after hearing senior counsel P.S. Raman and Satish Parasaran for PVR INOX and Additional Solicitor General AR.L. Sundaresan for AAI

title: CMC organises exhibition, poster contest on diabetes
content: The competition was centred around this year’s global theme, ‘Empowering Lives Through Access to Diabetes Care’

title: Colourful rally marks Children’s Day in Thrissur
content: Children’s ‘president,’ ‘prime minister,’ and ‘speaker’ take part in festivities. A special stamp released on the occasion

title: Children present their views as part of ‘Child-Secure Kerala’ event
content: 42 children from across the State took part in ‘Njangalum Parayaam’ organised by the Women and Child Development department on Children’s Day

title: Naidu, the CEO of AP Inc, is back with a bang
content: Touted to be the architect of IT and biotech industries in Hyderabad in the 1990s, the Chief Minister is leaving no stone unturned to attract investments to Andhra Pradesh and has set an ambitious objective to realise Viksit Andhra Pradesh by 2047

title: Butterfly Express, an initiative to provide library for village schools, inaugurated at Don Bosco School in Tiruvannamalai
content: The school in the agrarian Polur town is the second school to get a library under the initiative that encourages students to spend reading time in a library, apart from classroom learning

title: A movement seeking rightful place for women in democracy
content: Thulya Prathinidhya Prasthanam, a women’s movement demands one-third seats for women in next Assembly polls, calling present representation a democratic failure

title: Police secure four for assaulting State govt. employee in Yadgir
content: The victim, who works in the Social Welfare Department, has been shifted to a hospital in Hyderabad and her condition is critical

title: Election buzz boosts business in Kozhikode with bespoke campaign merchandise
content: From snazzy paper posters to custom-made keychains and colourful headgears, the shops are buzzing with activity as the creative entrepreneurs try to tap into the growing demand

title: Kerala MVD targets shadowy used car agencies in the wake of Delhi car blast
content: An estimated 1,000 used-car agencies operate in Kerala. Only 580 agencies have registered with the KMVD

title: NDA likely to announce remaining candidates for Kochi Corporation on Nov. 15
content: The NDA has issued its initial list of 32 candidates — 30 from the BJP and one each from the Kerala Congress (Nationalist) and the National People’s Party

title: West Bengal CEO receives barrage of complaints from political parties over a week into SIR
content: Meanwhile, a delegation of the Election Commission of India, including the Senior Deputy Election Commissioner Gyanesh Bharti, is likely to visit Kolkata early next week to monitor the progress of the ongoing SIR in West Bengal and attend special meeting on EVMs

title: Supreme Court believes CJI ‘must have’ acted on the anguish of ‘approached’ NCLAT Member

title: Bihar Assembly election: Results show people’s approval on NDA government’s service, says Amit Shah
